product.title: Spectrum Gull Grey - Venetian Blind
product.description: The spectrum's gull grey is a mid-grey, satin-finish blind, comprised of high quality aluminium slats that can be adjusted to allow the light in with ease, making it both functional and stylish to suit your every need. Using the gull grey in the home office will help you to create a pale, monochrome colour scheme, by omitting traditional black and going for greys and whites instead. If it's colour that you love, add in a sunny yellow or a sky blue as a brighter accent.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Dark Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finishand colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. relproducts.description: Their oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. relproducts.title: Stockholm Pebble Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm pebble grey is a beautiful saturated red shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm pebble grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Valencia Touchstone Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space. The pebbly grey fabric is chic and fashionable, but has an earthy tone that lends a little more cosiness. Its a hardwearing fabric too, easy to c sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Space Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Lima - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Casablanca - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Solitaire - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Christine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gossip - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Fuscous Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in fuscous grey is a blind designed to create an industrial or utilitarian feel in any modern home. A sturdy aluminium material, the glossy finish, and the cool, bold grey, combine to create a statement blind that is sure to catch the eye. Surround the fuscous grey with blacks, silvers, and whites for a modern monochrome colour scheme, scattering with the occasional bright yellow or bold orange.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Foggy Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The subtle soft cream-grey of the spectrum foggy grey is sweet and discreet, and everything in between. Colour-matched pull-cords and top and bottom rails help to create a streamlined look, so that you can enjoy this pretty hue without interruption. Group with charcoal greys and off-whites to create a softly monochrome colour scheme in an office or bedroom. Or create a sense of calm in the hallway or landing to welcome you and the family home after a stressful day out and about.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Moon Mist - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum moon mist is the very definition of subtlety, with its pretty, creamy hue, accentuated by the matte satin finish. Slim aluminium slats can be gently raised, lowered, or tilted at ease, adding functionality to this already stylish blind. Craft a serene and soothing atmosphere in the nursery by placing the moon mist amongst soft off-whites and pale greens, with pretty checked patterns to match.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Grey Flannel - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The satin-finish grey of the spectrum grey flannel is about as industrial a hue as there is. The grey colour provides contemporary style and the aluminium slats give the blind a functional and lasting quality. If you prefer a neutral look in the bedroom, and like to fill it dove greys, whites, and taupes, then the grey flannel could be the blind for you. Or team it with lime greens and blacks for a truly modern atmosphere in your dining room or office.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Cool Grey Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. This grey venetian blind will look great in any room in your home and will blend into most decors.
